remarks: Obsolete version of ~ ghmid as of 15-Mar-2020.  A group homomorphism maps identity element to identity element.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 3-Mar-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ghomidOLD.1 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
ghomidOLD.2 $e |- T = ( GId ` H ) $.
ghomidOLD $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ H e. GrpOp /\ F e. ( G GrpOpHom H ) ) -> ( F ` U ) = T ) $.
